attributes.action: bring nursing home care worker wages in line with other community workers wages and to recognise the inportance of this vital role.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having been through the situation of having one of my parents in a care home i think that thay desreve a higher pay than what they get.Would you clean a strangers backside !!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
